welcome.header: The social media that YOU control and define the boundaries.
welcome.privacyDescription: Your account doesn't require e-mails or phone numbers. Start just with your pair of keys
welcome.decentralizedDescription: Resistance to censorship and Big Techs control! You control where your consume and post information. Built on Nostr.
welcome.encryptedDescription: Content signed with YOUR private key! Messages encrypted with the same key. No one will ever get into your messages without your authorization. Ever.
welcome.value4valueDescription: Reward your favorite content with Bitcoin Lightning Network! Tip and stack sats
welcome.errorPublicKey: Error getting public key, check your key and try again!
